body_html: As @Stonesjtu noticed, hidden will prevent any part of the graph from being freed, so it will be saving state for backward over the whole sequence. Adding a periodical .detach_() will give you BPTT and won't fill up the whole memory

body: As @Stonesjtu noticed, `hidden` will prevent any part of the graph from being freed, so it will be saving state for backward over the whole sequence. Adding a periodical `.detach_()` will give you BPTT and won't fill up the whole memory
